trans-unit.source: Represents a 3-D rectangle: for example, a cube.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un rettangolo 3D: ad esempio, un cubo.

trans-unit.source: Rect3D is defined as a location (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>) and a size structure (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>).
trans-unit.target: Rect3D è definito come un percorso (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>) e una struttura di dimensione (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Z%2A> values specified for the size are magnitudes and not coordinates, they cannot be negative except in the case of an empty rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Poiché il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Z%2A>i valori specificati per la dimensione non coordinate grandezze, non possono essere negativi eccetto nel caso di un rettangolo vuoto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: An empty rectangle is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Empty%2A>, which has <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Z%2A> values of -Infinity.
trans-unit.target: Specificato da un rettangolo vuoto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Empty%2A>, che dispone di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Z%2A>valori - infinito.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D.Empty%2A>

trans-unit.source: This structure is typically used to represent the bounds of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>.
trans-unit.target: Questa struttura viene in genere utilizzata per rappresentare i limiti di una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> and Rect3D are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>e Rect3D non sono in genere utilizzata in XAML, poiché non esiste alcuna proprietà impostabile nel modello a oggetti 3D WPF che utilizzano tali tipi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D>

trans-unit.source: Note that in the 3-D coordinate system, the positive Y axis points up (assuming that the camera's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.UpDirection%2A> property is positive).
